title: Permits owners of house coaches to terminate insurance without surrendering registration and license plates
summary: Adjusts the allocation of Triborough bridge and tunnel authority surpluses to more fairly reflect the source of such surpluses and distribution of MTA riders; increases from twenty-four million dollars and fifty percentum to eighty percentum of the balance of such operating surplus.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to permitting owners of house coaches to terminate insurance without surrendering registration certificate and license plates
